string-array.name: tts_demo_strings
string-array.item: This is an example of speech synthesis in English.
Voici un échantillon de synthèse vocale en français.
Dies ist ein Beispiel für Sprachsynthese in Deutsch.
Questo è un esempio di sintesi vocale in italiano.
Este es un ejemplo de síntesis de voz en español.

string-array.name: hdcp_checking_summaries
string-array.item: Use HDCP checking for DRM content only

string-array.name: show_non_rect_clip_entries
string-array.item: Draw non-rectangular clip region in blue
Highlight tested drawing commands in green

string-array.name: vpn_types_long
string-array.item: IPSec VPN with pre-shared keys and Xauth authentication
IPSec VPN with certificates and Xauth authentication
IPSec VPN with certificates and hybrid authentication

string-array.name: alarm_set
string-array.item: This is set for less than 1 minute from now.
This is set for %1$s from now.
This is set for %2$s from now.
This is set for %1$s and %2$s from now.
This is set for %3$s from now.
This is set for %1$s and %3$s from now.
This is set for %2$s and %3$s from now.
This is set for %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s from now.

string-array.name: soft_ap_sleep_policy_entries
string-array.item: Turn off when idle for 5 mins
Turn off when idle for 10 mins
